    • 方法详细资料

      • getApplicationStarting

        public static EventDefinition<io.ktor.application.Application> getApplicationStarting()

        Even definition for Application Starting event

        Note, that application itself cannot receive this event because it fires before application is created It is meant to be used by engines.
